body.p: The Editing Window is the part of Serna Interface where you can see and edit your document, navigate it and make selections, which is especially easy with the help of context hints.

fig.title: Editing Window with an opened document.

body.p: Document editing can be done in two authoring modes: WYSIWYG mode and Text mode.

Content rendering in the Editing Window is controlled by the XSLT stylesheet. When you work with a document in the WYSIWYG mode, you actually see it with all the changes in real time thanks to the dynamic XSLT processing.
A document can be displayed as paginated or as a single page.
